meanings.definition: Proceeding or advancing in a series of steps or stages.
meanings.sent1: The stepwise approach to learning math helped the students understand each concept clearly.
meanings.sent2: She took a stepwise approach to organizing her room, starting with the closet.
meanings.sent3: The stepwise squirrel carefully climbed up the tree, pausing at each branch.
meanings.sent4: His stepwise progress in the marathon was steady and determined.
meanings.sent5: The stepwise growth of the plant from seed to flower was fascinating to watch.

meanings.definition: Moving or changing in small increments or steps.
meanings.sent1: The stepwise increase in temperature made the room more comfortable.
meanings.sent2: The robot moved stepwise, making precise adjustments with each small motion.
meanings.sent3: The stepwise snail slowly made its way across the garden, leaving a trail behind.
meanings.sent4: Her stepwise improvement in painting was evident in each new artwork.
meanings.sent5: The stepwise ticking of the clock filled the room with a rhythmic sound.
